question: Which customers have spent the most money in total?
query: SELECT TOP 10 c.CustomerID, c.CustomerName, SUM(il.ExtendedPrice) AS TotalSpent FROM Sales.Customers c JOIN Sales.Invoices i ON c.CustomerID = i.CustomerID JOIN Sales.InvoiceLines il ON i.InvoiceID = il.InvoiceID GROUP BY c.CustomerID, c.CustomerName ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC
reasoning: This query joins Customers, Invoices, and InvoiceLines to calculate total spending per customer. It groups by customer and orders by total spent descending to find the top spenders.
